sqlMap.select:
SELECT TT.CL_CODE, TT.CL_NM, TT.FILE_CODE, TT.DELETE_AT, TT.WRITNG_ID, TT.WRITNG_DE, TT.UPDT_ID, TT.UPDT_DE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_GOODS_CL TG WHERE TG.CL_CODE = TT.CL_CODE) AS GOODS_CNT FROM TB_TOUR_CL TT WHERE TT.DELETE_AT = 'N'
TT.CL_CODE IN
#cl_code_arr[]#
ORDER BY TT.CL_NM ASC

SELECT TT.CL_CODE, TT.CL_NM, TT.FILE_CODE, TT.DELETE_AT, TT.WRITNG_ID, TT.WRITNG_DE, TT.UPDT_ID, TT.UPDT_DE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_GOODS_CL TG WHERE TG.CL_CODE = TT.CL_CODE) AS GOODS_CNT FROM TB_TOUR_CL TT WHERE TT.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND TT.CL_CODE = #cl_code#

SELECT X.RN, X.TOT_CNT, X.GOODS_CODE, X.GOODS_NM, X.DELETE_AT, X.FILE_CODE, X.WRITNG_ID, X.WRITNG_DE, X.UPDT_ID, X.UPDT_DE, FN_CL_LIST(X.GOODS_CODE) AS CL_LIST, FN_SCHDUL_LIST(X.GOODS_CODE) AS SCHDUL_LIST FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RN, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOT_CNT FROM ( SELECT TG.GOODS_CODE, TG.GOODS_NM, TG.DELETE_AT, TG.FILE_CODE, TG.WRITNG_ID, TG.WRITNG_DE, TG.UPDT_ID, TG.UPDT_DE FROM TB_GOODS TG WHERE TG.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM TB_GOODS_CL TGC WHERE TGC.GOODS_CODE = TG.GOODS_CODE
TGC.CL_CODE IN
#cl_code_arr[]#
) ORDER BY TG.WRITNG_DE DESC ) A ) X WHERE (RN > #startRow# AND RN <= #endRow#) ORDER BY RN ASC

SELECT TG.GOODS_CODE, TG.GOODS_NM, TG.GOODS_INTRCN, TG.DELETE_AT, TG.FILE_CODE, TG.WRITNG_ID, TG.WRITNG_DE, TG.UPDT_ID, TG.UPDT_DE FROM TB_GOODS TG WHERE TG.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND TG.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code#
SELECT TC.CL_CODE, TC.CL_NM FROM TB_GOODS_CL GC INNER JOIN TB_TOUR_CL TC ON GC.CL_CODE = TC.CL_CODE WHERE GC.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# ORDER BY TC.CL_NM ASC

SELECT GS.BEGIN_DE, GS.END_DE, SUBSTR(GS.BEGIN_DE,1,4) ||'-'|| SUBSTR(GS.BEGIN_DE,5,2) ||'-'|| SUBSTR(GS.BEGIN_DE,7,2) AS BEGIN_CAL_DE, SUBSTR(GS.END_DE,1,4) ||'-'|| SUBSTR(GS.END_DE,5,2) ||'-'|| SUBSTR(GS.END_DE,7,2) AS END_CAL_DE FROM TB_GOODS_SCHDUL GS WHERE GS.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# AND GS.DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY GS.BEGIN_DE ASC
SELECT GN.NMPR_SN, GN.NMPR_CND, GN.SETUP_AMOUNT FROM TB_GOODS_NMPR GN WHERE GN.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND GN.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# ORDER BY GN.NMPR_SN ASC
SELECT GT.TIME_SN, GT.BEGIN_TIME, GT.END_TIME FROM TB_GOODS_TIME GT WHERE GT.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND GT.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# ORDER BY GT.BEGIN_TIME
